attributes.title: This app murdered my entire family
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because the Cheeto faced toddler on the TV told me that if I didn’t I was unamerican! So I did my civic duty and downloaded this app, and was met only with bloodshed and tragedy. This app stole all of my information and sent it to CHINA! Secret services appeared at my house, kidnapped me, and held me hostage for 63 days. During that time I was indoctrinated with the words of bunker baby boy. When i returned home everything I loved had vanished. 1/5 stars would not recommend.

attributes.title: crashes
attributes.userName: kanye can make a better app
attributes.review: I’m not sure what all the other one stars are on about because their stories make no sense. I truly did want to download this app because of our great leader president Trump. But as soon as I opened the app it asked for a lot of my information which I am not comfortable with because it infringes on my rights. and then once I put in my information it kept crashing! I’m very disappointed in what our fearless and intelligent leader has provided us. Kanye 2020🇺🇸

attributes.title: ✨🧚🏻‍♂️Poopoo🧚🏻‍♂️✨
attributes.review: This app took  FIVE DAYS to download!!! And when it actually did download, it crashed and I had to buy an entirely new phone because it destroyed everything on mine. I would not recommend this app, and it should not even be allowed in the App Store 🐸🙊 I also did not appreciate his nudes that popped up in my feed. It was disturbing and inappropriate. Now my kids are blind and can no longer see because the looks of that burnt potato chip are forever in their minds🐷

attributes.title: Dissapointed😤
attributes.review: This app is the worst app in the history of apps. I downloaded it to show my ✨support✨ to our God President Donald J. Trump but it’s done everything but that. Someone said the app took 76 weeks to download, mine took 89 years and then my phone exploded💥. When I finally did get to use the app my house exploded💥. When I asked for compensation, they told me to “Shut my communist liberal mouth up” and we love our administration for destroying libtards on a daily🥰 I’d give this 0/5 stars but I can’t 💕

attributes.title: This app was horrible🤬😤
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for..well who knows why but it’s terrible I opened it and the first thing to come up was a sex tape of kin kardashian, then it sent out my location and made my whole phone crash it also took 5 days to download and when it finally did it took up all the storage on my whole phone and was just a big old problem. If I could give this app 0 stars I would it was just terrible please DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!

attributes.title: Officially the WORST app
attributes.review: if you’re considering downloading this app, DO NOT. it has CONSUMED all of my personal data. it has asked me for so much personal information and it spams not only my email and my text messages, but it pops up in my instagram and facebook content. EXTREMELY CREEPY. I WONDER WHAT ELSE IS ACTUALLY GOING ON THAT WE DONT KNOW ABOUT. I am one of the few people that actually READS the terms & conditions and there’s SEVERAL clauses that basically grant the app access to MY ENTIRE PHONE INCLUDING PHOTOS NOTES AND MESSAGES. SOMEONE WILL SEE MY NUDES. DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: This app is actual garbage. Once opened it requires a phone number in order to do anything and nobody should feel comfortable giving their number to the scum of the earth. I would give 0 stars if that was possible, but it’s not so here I am giving a detailed review about how it is clearly the worst app in existence. Please stay away from this app in order to keep your personal information safe, and to not be accused of supporting a racist and homophobic piece of crap.

attributes.title: Worst app i have ever seen
attributes.review: So first of all i tried to download this app to support the best president of all time. The app took very long time to download then my patience ran out and i tried to delete it but it won’t let me.  Then after many hours of trying i deleted it. In a few days i tried to download it once again everything was fine until runed the app my phone crashed. Idk if its just me but this app is literally worst app i have ever seen❤️

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
attributes.review: thanks to the trump app my dearest, closest, and only friend DIED:(💔 not only was she my bff, she was my dog of eight years😔 she had so many more years ahead of her, but NO this DEVILS👿app (after taking weeks to download) KILLED my dog.😫 as soon as i opened the app and started looking around 👀 my dog stopped dead in her tracks and died 🐾☠️this trump app took away the only thing that meant anything to me. they broke my heart and crushed my soul.🤧 so unless you want the o e thing you love DIE don’t get this horrible app.😤

attributes.title: PLEASE STAY AWAY!!! 😱
attributes.review: This app slowed down my phone completely. I just got my 11 pro max and as soon as I put this app on everything begin to glitch. I do not know if it maybe hackers trying to take my information or even the system software setup of this app. Whichever one it is DO NOT DOWNLOAD, you won’t even be able to take a picture, make a phone call, send a text or even use another app with it shutting down. Deleted the app all problems solved. Wow.
